_header: As a master that them taught
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; Ascension, feast of; sermons, verse in
_description: Characteristics of christ in a Latin sermon ‘de ascensione domini’ — roughly two cross-rhymed quatrains

CULKk424.Transcription:
as a mayster þat hem tauȝthþat were leude &
                    vnkunnyngeas a werriour þat ys pray y kauȝth& ouercome
                    woo & angeras a Iuge þat demeth wel sorehem þat ben in
                    syn dwellyngas a kyng forto reyne euer more& men to mede after
                    here beryng
CULKk424.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Preachers, Poets and the English Lyric.
         Princeton: Princeton Univ. Press, 1986: 94-5.
